description: 0x series robots (pronounced as Ox) are the most versatile, accurate and durable mobile robotics platforms by Nex Robotics.
ROS-Industrial support for ABB manipulators
A complete hardware and software solution that allows seamless control of throttle, brake, steering, and shifting.
AMIGO is an acronym for Autonomous Mate for IntelliGent Operations. AMIGO is a domestic service robot developed and created at the Eindhoven University of Technology.
AMIR 740 is a robotic arm designed to be mounted easily on a mobile robot for researchers. It is made from aluminum, has a 2kg payload, and a 740mm reach.
This is the AR10 robotic hand from Active8 Robots. It is actuated using 10 prismatic servos which can be used to achieve a wide variety of poses.

ARI is a high-performance robotic platform designed for a wide range of multimodal expressive gestures and behaviours, making it the ideal social robot and suitable for human-robot interaction, perception, cognition and navigation, especially thanks to its touchscreen, gaze control and versatile gestures. With a combination of Intel i7 and NVIDIA Jetson TX2 GPU, you will have enough processing power available for AI development.
RoboTiCan ARMadillo is a mobile base with an arm that is fully compatible with ROS.
Aubo robotics I-Series are high-quality and low-cost industrial robots.
Allegro Hand is a low-cost and highly adaptive robotic hand.
Small general purpose differential-drive mobile robot platform
The AscTec Pelican and Hummingbird quadrotor helicopters are built by Ascending Technologies and can be interfaced with ROS.
AutoRally is a high-performance testbed for robotics research.
BIG-i is a natural-interaction robot with mobility, 3D vision, voice programming, and active perception.
The BH8-series BarrettHand™ is a multi-fingered programmable grasper with the dexterity to secure target objects of different sizes, shapes, and orientations.
BipedRobin is a biped walking robot developed at the Institute for Robotics at Johannes Kepler University Linz.
The BlueROV is a remotely operated underwater vehicle from Blue Robotics. It features Blue Robotics thrusters, a flight controller with ArduSub software, and a RaspberryPi running ROS.

Bo, is the first embodiment of the BotsAndUs technology. It is a new, dynamic, autonomous robot for brand engagement. With an AI driven data acquisition system it allows companies to listen and adapt in realtime to their customers true needs.
The bulldog(professional Robot) is a robust and versatile middle size plazfrom designed for outdoor operations.
Educational drone kit, powered by PX4, Raspberry Pi, and ROS

CRANE-X7 is compact, well styled and compatible for ROS and suit for research on collaborative robots.CRANE-X7 has a 7-axis structure and is possible to make the plan to avoid the obstacle and simulate a flexible operation such as a person’s arm.
The Care-O-Bot
Carla is a self-driving Lincoln MKZ developed by Udacity and equipped with LIDAR, radar, and cameras.
Caster is a diff-drive indoor unmanned ground vehicle, suitable for research and indoor service applications.
caster moma is a mobile manipulator platform for the scientific research
Surface vessel featuring a payload bay for mounting submerged sensors or equipment on deck. Comes pre-installed with Linux and ROS.
Husky is a rugged, outdoor-ready unmanned ground vehicle (UGV), suitable for research and rapid prototyping applications.
Jackal's fully integrated, weatherproof design offers unique capability in a compact package.
Ridgeback is a midsize indoor robot platform that uses an omni-drive to move manipulators and heavy payloads with ease.
Warthog is a large all-terrain unmanned ground vehicle capable of traveling on land and in water.

Botsync Copernicus is a rugged and easy to integrate ground vehicle designed to support your prototyping and research needs for outdoor applications. Copernicus supports ROS out of the box and provides access to motion commands through a serial interface.
CoroBot is a capable, expandable and affordable mobile robot platform designed to minimize the complexity of robot development.
Crazyflie is an open-source nano quadcopter made by Bitcraze.
The ROS-Cyton Module provides a ROS interface for Energid's actinSE and Robai's Cyton 7-DOF humanoid manipulators. The aim of this module is to expose actinSE and the Cyton hardware API through ROS.

patented design with six-wheeled independent drive suspension and independent steering, a unique and flexible control mode, outstanding passability, omnidirectional motion modes, and unique flexible shock absorbing steering mechanism.
Dobot CR is is a collaborative 6-axis robot.
MG400 is a lightweight desktop robotic arm
This repository is about 6-axis Doosan robots. It includes packages such as moveit, Gazebo, as well as Doosan controller interlocking packages for ROS.
Dynamixel (Dynamic + Cell) is a high-performance, all-in-one actuator designed for multi-jointed robot configurations.
The Elfin is an affordable 6-DOF manipulator designed for research and automation.

Erle-brain is a Linux-based autopilot for making drones. It consists of a BeagleBone Black and a PixHawk Fire cape that put together conform a 1GHz Cortex-A8 embedded computer that has 29 sensors and many interfacing possibilities.

Erle-copter is a Linux-based drone that uses the award winning APM:Copter autopilot software. It’s capable of the different flight modes and ideal for outdoor operations. It has been designed for an extended flight time and it can carry a takeoff weight of about 2 kilograms.
Erle-HexaCopter is a "heavy lifter" version of Erle-Copter, a Linux-based drone that uses the award winning APM:Copter autopilot software.
Erle-Plane is a fixed-wing drone based on the award winner APM:Plane platform.
Erle-Rover is a Linux-based Unmanned Ground Vehicle (UGV) that uses the Robot Operating System (ROS) and the APM:Rover APM:Rover autopilot.
Erle-Spider is a Linux-based legged drone powered based totally in ROS, the Robot Operating Syst
The evarobot is a mobile robot platform built by Inovasyon Muhendislik.

This repository is part of the ROS-Industrial program. It currently contains packages that provide nodes for communication with Fanuc industrial robot controllers, URDF models for supported manipulators and associated MoveIt packages.
Fetch is a mobile manipulation platfor m built by Fetch Robotics. The Fetch software system uses ROS extensively. All Fetch capabilities are thus available via ROS messages, services or actions.
ForteRC is a mobile robotic platform designed for research in the field of social robotics.
Freight is a mobile robotics platform built by Fetch Robotics. The Freight software system uses ROS extensively. All Freight capabilities are thus available via ROS messages, services or actions.
Educational copter using ROS and MAVLink

RaspberryPi-based educational robot, rated 5/5 by the MagPi, the official Raspberry Pi Foundation magazine. The GoPiGo3 offers a full range to support every type of learners. It can be used by beginner coders using Bloxter, intermediate users have a pre-installed JupyterLab, and advanced users can now do ROS.

description: Hamster is a robust micro Autonomous Unmanned Ground Vehicle.
Han's Cute is an affordable 7-DOF manipulator designed for research and automation.
Hansbot is a high-quality and low-cost industrial mobile robot that has comparable performance with many well known players in mobile robotics area.
The NEXTAGE OPEN / Hiro (HiroNXO) is a manipulation platform built by Kawada Industries.

IR-C100 is the last generation of logistics and transportation robots. It uses the last navigation method without any magnetic system.Strip, reflector, QR code, intelligent obstacle avoidance,eliminating the need for traditional AVG.Intelligent, flexible, safe, can be deployed in just half day.The overall cost is lower than similar products.

IR-R300 is the last generation of logistics and transportation robots.It uses the last navigation method without any magnetic system.Strip, reflector, QR code, intelligent obstacle avoidance, eliminating the need for traditional AVG.Intelligent, flexible, safe, can be deployed in just half day.The overall cost is lower than similar products.

Innok Heros is a modular outdoor all-terrain robot platform available in 2 or 4 wheel drive configurations. Due to its modular construction, it can be easily modified to suit lots of different agricultural, logistics, industrial and research applications.
The Intel® Edison is an ultra small computing platform that will allow you to jump into ROS with a stamp size computer.

The Intel® Euclid™ Development Kit features the integration of Intel® RealSense™ depth camera technology, a motion camera, and an Intel® Atom™ x7-Z8700 Quad core CPU to produce a compact and sleek all-in-one computer and depth camera. The Intel® Euclid™ Development Kit is designed to be operable out of the box with pre-installed software including an Ubuntu® operating system.
The JACO Robot Arm is modular and efficient, with a payload-to-weight ratio that is ideal for day to day activities.
An all terrain unmanned ground vehicle.
Jazz is a mobile telepresence robot developed by Gostai.

Co-developed by NVIDIA and the robotics department at California Polytechnic State University, ‘Jet’ is a smart, autonomous robot based on the NVIDIA Jetson embedded development platform utilizing Servocity Acotobotics components. Jet’s brain is built around the NVIDIA Tegra SoC and uses the same NVIDIA computing cores designed into supercomputers. This gives Jet compute-intensive computer vision, artificial intelligence (AI), and self-driving capabilities in a low-cost package.
Kingfisher Unmanned Surface Vessel (USV) is an agile, battery operated boat designed for research and rapid prototyping.
A small mobile base which is commonly used as the TurtleBot.

LIMO is an innovative multi-modal, compact, and customizable mobile robot with Al modules and open-sources packages, which enables education, researchers, enthusiasts to program and develop Al robots easier. The LIMO has four steering modes including Omni-directional steering, tracked steering, Ackermann and four-wheel differential, in line with strong perception sensors and Nvidia Jetson Nano, making it a better platform to develop more indoor and outdoor industrial applications while learning ROS.

description: NXT is a modular robotics kit manufactured by Lego.
Leo Rover is an outdoor robotics kit ready for developers. Leo Rover provides a sturdy mobile robot platform with remote control, video streaming, odometry and autonomy capabilities.

The LoCoBot is a mobile manipulator from Carnegie Mellon University and designed to run Facebook AI's PyRobot. PyRobot is an open source, lightweight, high-level interface on top of the robot operating system (ROS). It provides a consistent set of hardware-independent mid-level APIs to control different robots. PyRobot abstracts away details about low-level controllers and interprocess communication so users can focus on building high-level AI robotics applications.
MD80 is an integrated brushless motor controller designed by MAB robotics for transforming regular brushless motors into advanced actuators.
The MICO Robot Arm is modular and efficient, with a payload-to-weight ratio that is ideal for day to day activities.

MIP robotics making industrial robotics accessible ! The Junior is our first industrial collaborative robotic arm starting at 9500€, easy to program and safe. Give it a try ! Compatible with to Gazebo and MoveIt!
MRP2 is an easy to use mobile research robot developed by Milvus Robotics.
Maggie robot is a social robot platform built by the Social Robots Group from RoboticsLab at University Carlos III of Madrid.
Magni Silver provides a solid base to jumpstart your robotics application. With a payload over 100kg, at an affordable price, Magni Silver is a powerful and capable mobile base.
Mecanumbot is a software research platform with a holonomic base
Mecanumrover Ver.3.0 is a four-wheel drive mobile platform with BLDC mecanum wheels and has a payload of 40kg which is developed by Vstone.
Megarover F120A is a differential drive mobile base robot with a payload of 120kg developed by Vstone.
Megarover Ver.3.0 is a differential drive mobile base robot with a payload of 40kg developed by Vstone.

The Merlin MiabotPRO is a small autonomous mobile robot featuring a high precision drive train, dual processor design, onboard wireless communications, with extensive support for additional peripherals.
The Mini-Lab is a medium sized robot that offers the best trade-off between robustness and price. It is suitable for research as a test-bed for the development of indoor applications.
The low-cost ROS robot with big capabilities!

description: The Mobility Base is a mobile base for the Rethink Robotics Baxter robot.
The motoman stack constains libraries, configuration files, and ROS nodes for controlling a Motoman robot from ROS-Industrial
The Commonplace Robotics Mover robots are developed for education, research and entertainment.
Nao is a commercially available humanoid robot built by Aldebaran. The ROS driver was originally developed by Freiburg's Humanoid Robots Lab and Armin Hornung.
The Nav2 is a modular robotics platform created by Crosswing Inc, consisting of an omniwheel holonomic mobile base and interchangeable upper components.
Navio2 Autopliot Shield for Raspberry Pi board

Ned is a collaborative and open source 6 axis robot made in France, and the second robot developped by Niryo. It is aimed for higher education, vocational training and R&D laboratories. Its use is particularly adapted to study robotics and programming in the context of industry 4.0.
The mobile manipulator MMO-500 combines the omnidirectional base MPO-500 with a light-weight robot arm from Universal Robots, Kuka, Schunk or PILZ.
The mobile manipulator MMO-700 combines the omnidirectional base MPO-700 with a light-weight robot arm from Universal Robots, Kuka, Schunk or PILZ.
Neobotix MP-400 is a small, agile robot for material flow and intralogistics in industrial applications. Automatic charging station and load handling system available.
The MP-500 is a medium sized mobile robot designed for indoor applications that are too rough for other robots.
The mobile robot Neobotix MPO-500 features four Mecanum wheels which provide an extraordinary manoeuvrability.
The mobile robot Neobotix MPO-700 is the ideal base for high-end service robots. Its four Omni-Drive-Modules enable it to move extremely smoothly into any direction.

Niryo One is a collaborative and open source 6-axis robot made in France for : Higher education, Vocational training and R&D laboratories. Its use is particularly adapted to study robotics and programming in the context of industry 4.0.

Nox is a DIY differential drive robot which uses SLAM (gmapping) with a Kinect to navigate in its environment. It is powered by ROS running on a Raspberry Pi 3 Model B and an Arduino Mega controlling two DC motors with encoders.
Oculus Prime SLAM Navigator is a low cost, open-source mobile robot available from Xaxxon Technologies, ready for ROS applications -- with auto-charging, ROS navigation, and internet tele-operation.
The Open Rover is designed for companies looking for a rugged affordable robot to build on top of, where 100's or 1000's of robots can be deployed with minimal maintanance cost.
OpenCR means Open-source Control Module for ROS. OpenCR is developed for ROS embedded systems to provide completely open-source hardware and software.
ROS-enabled OpenManipulator is a full open robot platform consisting of OpenSoftware, OpenHardware and OpenCR(Embedded board)​.
SensorHand Speed is a hand prosthetics product developed by Otto Bock.
The PR2 is a state of the art mobile manipulator.

Panther is an industrial grade, professional UGV designed with outdoor environment in mind. It is an autonomous, open source robot platform running on ROS (Robot Operating System). Depending on the use-case it can be equipped with a LIDAR, RGB-D camera, robotic arm and other hardware. It can be used in a variety of applications such as agriculture, logistics, rescue, inspection and more.
Panther is an outdoor tracked robot, with a ZED stereocamera and an NVIDIA Jetson TX2, this robot can interact with all objects around it.
Pepper is a commercially available humanoid robot built by Aldebaran and Softbank Robotics.
High-Precision and Ultra-Precision Motion Systems for Industry, Research and Development. This package contains the ROS Driver for Hexapods from Physik Instrumente (PI).
Medium-sized general purpose skid-steer mobile robot platform
Medium-sized general purpose differential drive mobile robot platform
Industrial-quality general purpose differential drive mobile robot platform with integrated computer
Customizable mobile manipulator system built on Pioneer LX
Large general purpose differential drive mobile robot platform

QTrobot, a toddler-like humanoid built by LuxAI S.A, is a socially engaging and interactive robot with a wide areas of application. QTrobot is currently being used for emotional training of children with autism, post-stroke rehabilitation and elderly cognitive and physical rehabilitation.
A novel, affordable, modular hardware and accompanying low-level software platform for enabling non-contact human-robot interaction research.
RB-KAIROS+ is presented as a solution for Universal Robots e-Series users
Customizable mobile manipulator for carrying out industrial tasks
RB-1 is an autonomous and configurable robot, focused on the field of research in indoor applications.
RB-1 BASE is a mobile platform designed for the research of robotic solutions and the development of applications.
RB-2 Base is suitable for industrial applications in logistics
The mobile platform RBCAR has RWD Ackerman kinematics. The traction is controlled by an AC motor with incremental encoder and the direction through a power steering system with absolute encoder.

REEM, the humanoid service robot created by PAL Robotics, can be used for several purposes. Thanks to its autonomous navigation system, its user-friendly touchscreen, and its voice and face recognition system, REEM can find its way in various surroundings and help or entertain people in most public environments.

REEM-C is the latest commercial humanoid robot of PAL Robotics. REEM-C is an adult size humanoid (165 cm), and it has 44 degrees of freedom, two i7 computers, force/torque and range finders on each feet, stereo camera, 4 microphones, and other devices that make REEM-C one of the best equipped research platforms today.

The RH-P12-RN is 1-DOF two-finger hand. It supports DYNAMIXEL 2.0 protocol via DYNAMIXEL BUS. This hand designed for adaptive gripping, so you can use it for adaptive gripping for various shapes of objects. Also, it supports torque control and current-based position control make it possible to pick up objects of various materials.
The ROBOTIS-MANIPULATOR is an affordable multi-purpose manipulator designed for research and automation.
ROBOTIS OP3 is the latest miniature humanoid robot platform from ROBOTIS that succeeds ROBOTIS OP(aka “DARWIN OP”) and ROBOTIS OP2(aka “DARWIN 2” or “DARWIN OP2”).

Robot with LiDAR, designed to learn and develop ROS projects, with a dedicated tutorial available. Good base to add extensions - sensors, grippers, etc. thanks to many interfaces available on the rear panel.

ROSbot 2.0 is a successor of ROSbot - an autonomous, open source robot platform - now with a RGBD camera and improved design. It can be used as a learning platform for ROS as well as a base for a variety of robotic applications.

ROSbot 2.0 is a successor of ROSbot - an autonomous, open source robot platform - now with a RGBD camera and improved design. It can be used as a learning platform for ROS as well as a base for a variety of robotic applications.
This is a wheel-type robot equipped with a minimal computer Raspberry Pi for programming learning.
Reachy is an expressive open-source humanoid platform programmable with Python and ROS. He is particularly good at interacting with people and manipulating objects.
Revel is a low cost robotic manipulator intended for education, research, light automation & manufacturing.
1/10 AD Development Platform
This platform provides researchers, engineers and hackers the ability to easily design their robotic application on top of a modular hardware interface.
A Robonaut is a dexterous humanoid robot built and designed at NASA Johnson Space Center in Houston, Texas.
Robotino comes with sensors, actuators and software interfaces that you would expect from a modern state of the art mobile robot system.
Roch is an intelligent, open source mobile robot platform.
Romeo is a humanoid robot built by Aldebaran.
The Roomba is an autonomous vacuum cleaner sold by iRobot.
The Commonplace Robotics SRA Service Robot Arm is a light robot arm for mobile applications, but provides a large reach and good payload.

The most compact, powerful lightweight arm in the world with three highly-integrated Powerball modules offers 6 degrees of freedom. Integrated intelligence makes powerful, mobile handling possible as never before.

The anthropomorphic SCHUNK 5-finger hand grips nearly as perfectly as the human hand. Due to the moving parts with a total of nine drives, various gripping operations can be executed with high sensitivity. Elastic gripping surfaces ensure a reliable grip on objects.
Sciurus17 is a 17DoF upper-body humanoid robot with a 3D head camera and an RGB chest camera.
Large outdoor general-purpose holonomic mobile robot platform
Large outdoor general-purpose skid-steer robot
The Segway RMPv3 Platform Family
The Shadow Dexterous Hand is a truly anthropomorphic approach to robot manipulation.
The Commonplace Robotics SliderSRA is a light indoor manipulation platform.
Spark is an affordable development platform for ROS applications, with mobility and vision system.
SUMMIT XL is a high versatile, high mobility, indoor/outdoor mobile robot platform manufactured by Robotnik.
SUMMIT-XL STEEL is a robotic platform for application development (logistics, indoor transport, etc.) manufactured by Robotnik.

TALOS is a fully electrical humanoid robot that has sensored torque control in all its joints and uses EtherCAT bus protocol. It is ready to tackle complex industrial tasks with its 6 Kg payload with each arm.

THOR (Tactical Hazardous Operations Robot) is an affordable, full size humanoid robot platform with advanced computational power, sophisticated sensors, high payload capacity, and dynamic motion abilities to enable many exciting researches and educational activities.
TIAGo is a service robot designed to work in indoor environments.

TIAGo Base is an indoor mobile robot designed with minimum footprint and maximum payload in mind. Its primary sensors are a laser range finder, an IMU and ultrasound sensors with a user panel to add new devices.

Two LIDAR sensors for an unobstructed 360º FOV secure movement, including autonomous navigation, obstacle detection and path planning. Move and navigate the omnidirectional base with ease thanks to its precision positioning in constrained environments.
TIAGo++ is a bi-manual service robot designed to work in indoor environments.
TUlip is a humanoid robot developed in the Dynamics and Control group of the department of Mechanical Engineering at the Eindhoven University of Technology.
Tally - Autonomous Shelf Auditing Robot
TurtleBot is a low-cost, personal robot kit with open-source software
The TurtleBot3 is a new generation mobile robot that is modular, compact and customizable.

TurtleBot 4 is the next-generation of the world’s most popular open source robotics platform for education and research, offering better computing power, better sensors and a world class user experience at an affordable price point.
Turtlebot Euclid is a mobile robot platform designed for learning and development.

This repository is part of the ROS-Industrial program. It currently contains packages that provide nodes for communication with universal robot manipulators, URDF models for supported manipulators and associated MoveIt packages.

Botsync VOLTA is a flexible and configurable ground robot platform for a wide range of use-cases from learning ROS to developing advanced research projects. Use VOLTA robot as a plug-and-play solution for varying computational, payload and sensor requirements.
WheeledRobin WheeledRobin is a two wheeled robot that balances on his wheels and is able to receive commands via the serial interface from a host computer

ASIMoV Robotics has launched a new series of multi-purpose mobile platforms useful for indoor and outdoor applications with unique omni-directional mobility and unmatched payload capabilities. X-Terrabot's software system is written entirely in ROS.

The Interbotix X-Series Robot arms offer many different configurations of length and payload with reach up to 750mm and working payload up to 750g. Additionally, they have between 4 and 6 degrees of freedom. Each of the arms comes assembled and tested out of the box.

X-Series Robot Turrets are high resolution pan and tilt kits built around the high performance DYNAMIXEL X-Series smart servos from Robotis. The turrets are ideal for applications utilizing vision tracking or cameras.
Xiaoqiang is a three wheeled development platform for robot enthusiasts or developers.
This YZ-01B is a ROS robot platform with 50Kg payload and with auto-charging dock
This YZ-01C is a business class ROS robot platform, you can easily develope business robot with it
Bveeta mini is an educational ROS mobile robot created by Bizbot Technology, Malaysia.
A ROS based 6DoF 3D printed arm for robotics learning
The world's most compact 6DOF robotic arm
The lightest and smallest six axis cooperative robot in the world
The smallest NVIDIA Jetson dinosaur robot
The ST Robotics r12 is a low-cost 5 axis articulated robot arm suitable for a range of automation tasks. It is low cost, highly accurate, and fast.
roshand gen2 is a low-cost and highly adaptive robotic hand, every fingertips have 14 tactile sensors, 28 tactile sensors in total.

The xArm series is the most affordable and versatile robotic arm on the market. Crafted from carbon fiber and assembled using powerful harmonic joins, xArms prove that automation can be made reliable and easy.
Xbot is one of the best robot for beginners.
is 40Kg, payload is 100Kg. This platform is designed for outdoor application
